VUPShionMod:Strike_Shion.NAME: Shell
VUPShionMod:Strike_Shion.DESCRIPTION: Shoot with vup_shion_mod:Funnel. NL Deal !D! damage.

VUPShionMod:DefenseSystemCharging.NAME: Back on Defense
VUPShionMod:DefenseSystemCharging.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Trigger the passive ability of *Gravity vup_shion_mod:Funnel . NL If the last card played this combat was a vup_shion_mod:Funnel card, return to your hand.

VUPShionMod:DeploymentOfDefenseSystem.NAME: Defense Unfold
VUPShionMod:DeploymentOfDefenseSystem.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card this turn, gain !M! Block.

VUPShionMod:QuickAttack.NAME: Quick Attack
VUPShionMod:QuickAttack.DESCRIPTION: vup_shion_mod:Loading Complete. NL vup_shion_mod:Fire vup_shion_mod:Funnel. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust.

VUPShionMod:QuickDefend.NAME: Quick Defense
VUPShionMod:QuickDefend.DESCRIPTION: vup_shion_mod:Loading Complete. NL Gain !B! Block . NL Trigger the passive ability of *Gravity vup_shion_mod:Funnel . NL Exhaust.

VUPShionMod:QuickScreen.NAME: Quick Skim
VUPShionMod:QuickScreen.DESCRIPTION: vup_shion_mod:Loading Complete. NL Scry !M!. NL Draw !VUPShionSecondM! cards. NL Exhaust.

VUPShionMod:SpeedShot.NAME: Bombard
VUPShionMod:SpeedShot.DESCRIPTION: vup_shion_mod:Fire vup_shion_mod:Funnel. NL Deal damage equal to vup_shion_mod:Total Upgrade X times.
VUPShionMod:SpeedShot.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: vup_shion_mod:Fire vup_shion_mod:Funnel. NL Deal damage equal to vup_shion_mod:Total Upgrade X+1 times.

VUPShionMod:AttackInitiation.NAME: Initialize
VUPShionMod:AttackInitiation.DESCRIPTION: For the next !M! cards this turn, draw 1 card whenever you play a card.

VUPShionMod:EnduranceInitiation.NAME: Endure
VUPShionMod:EnduranceInitiation.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle 1 copy of the chosen card into your draw pile. NL Grant vup_shion_mod:Loading Complete. NL Exhaust.
VUPShionMod:EnduranceInitiation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Shuffle 2 copies of the chosen card into your draw pile and discard pile. NL Grant vup_shion_mod:Loading Complete. NL Exhaust.

VUPShionMod:AttackPreparation.NAME: Ready Posture
VUPShionMod:AttackPreparation.DESCRIPTION: Retain your hand. NL Gain [E] next turn.
VUPShionMod:AttackPreparation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain your hand. NL Gain [E] [E] next turn.

VUPShionMod:Strafe.NAME: Strafe
VUPShionMod:Strafe.DESCRIPTION: vup_shion_mod:Fire vup_shion_mod:Funnel. NL Deal damage equal to vup_shion_mod:Total Upgrade !M! times.

VUPShionMod:AnastasiaCore.NAME: Anastasia Reactor
VUPShionMod:AnastasiaCore.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a vup_shion_mod:Funnel card this turn, gain [E] and draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.

VUPShionMod:DimensionSplitting.NAME: Dimension Split
VUPShionMod:DimensionSplitting.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage !M! times as much as the number of vup_shion_mod:Funnel cards played this turn.

VUPShionMod:Goodbye.NAME: Enough!
VUPShionMod:Goodbye.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust your hand. NL For each card Exhausted , deal !D! damage.

VUPShionMod:EnhancedWeapon.NAME: Accelerate
VUPShionMod:EnhancedWeapon.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you trigger vup_shion_mod:Loading Complete ,draw a card.
VUPShionMod:EnhancedWeapon.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you trigger vup_shion_mod:Loading Complete ,draw a card.

VUPShionMod:Boot.NAME: Boot Up
VUPShionMod:Boot.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle !M! copy of your hand into your draw pile. NL End your turn.

VUPShionMod:FirstStrike.NAME: Initiative Strike
VUPShionMod:FirstStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Costs !M! additional [E] for each time it is played during this combat.

VUPShionMod:Rob.NAME: Pillage
VUPShionMod:Rob.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to vup_shion_mod:Total Upgrade. NL If Fatal , gain !M! gold.
VUPShionMod:Rob.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to 4+ vup_shion_mod:Total Upgrade. NL If Fatal , gain !M! gold.

VUPShionMod:AttackOrderAlpha.NAME: Order: Aggressive
VUPShionMod:AttackOrderAlpha.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Damage dealt by vup_shion_mod:Funnel each turn is increased by !M! times. NL Incompatible with other Orders.

VUPShionMod:AttackOrderBeta.NAME: Order: Concussive
VUPShionMod:AttackOrderBeta.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Damage dealt by vup_shion_mod:Funnel each turn now hits ALL enemies. NL Incompatible with other Orders.

VUPShionMod:AttackOrderGamma.NAME: Order: Harassing
VUPShionMod:AttackOrderGamma.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Damage dealt by vup_shion_mod:Funnel each turn now also applies !M! vup_shion_mod:Bleeding. NL Incompatible with other Orders.

VUPShionMod:AttackOrderDelta.NAME: Order: Versatile
VUPShionMod:AttackOrderDelta.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Damage dealt by vup_shion_mod:Funnel each turn now grants you equal Block. NL Incompatible with other Orders.

VUPShionMod:Reboot.NAME: Reinstall
VUPShionMod:Reboot.DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand, then draw that many cards.

VUPShionMod:TeamWork.NAME: Teamwork
VUPShionMod:TeamWork.DESCRIPTION: Choose 3 cards from *Cloyce, *Anastasia, *Minami and *Liyezhu cards to add into your hand. They cost 0 this turn and Exhaust upon being played. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

VUPShionMod:AnastasiaPlan.NAME: Anastasia Program
VUPShionMod:AnastasiaPlan.DESCRIPTION: Your next !M! card(s) is played twice.

VUPShionMod:LockOn.NAME: Lock On
VUPShionMod:LockOn.DESCRIPTION: Target takes !M! additional damage from Attacks this turn.

VUPShionMod:EnergyReserve.NAME: Energy Reserve
VUPShionMod:EnergyReserve.DESCRIPTION: vup_shion_mod:Loading Complete. NL Gain [E]. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust Grave.

VUPShionMod:InvestigationUpgrade.NAME: Scouting Upgrade
VUPShionMod:InvestigationUpgrade.DESCRIPTION: vup_shion_mod:Task ： NL Play 5 vup_shion_mod:Funnel cards during this combat. NL Reward: Scouting Funnel is upgraded by 1.

VUPShionMod:GravityUpgrade.NAME: Gravity Upgrade
VUPShionMod:GravityUpgrade.DESCRIPTION: vup_shion_mod:Task ： NL Play 5 vup_shion_mod:Funnel cards during this combat. NL Reward: Gravity Funnel is upgraded by 1.

VUPShionMod:PursuitUpgrade.NAME: Pursuing Upgrade
VUPShionMod:PursuitUpgrade.DESCRIPTION: vup_shion_mod:Task ： NL Play 5 vup_shion_mod:Funnel cards during this combat. NL Reward: Pursuing Funnel is upgraded by 1.

VUPShionMod:TimeBacktracking.NAME: Reverse Time
VUPShionMod:TimeBacktracking.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Gain [E] next turn.
VUPShionMod:TimeBacktracking.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Gain [E] [E] next turn.

VUPShionMod:TimeSlack.NAME: Cushion
VUPShionMod:TimeSlack.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Trigger the passive ability of *Gravity vup_shion_mod:Funnel . NL Shuffle !M! *Quick *Defense into your discard pile.

VUPShionMod:TimeStop.NAME: Pause
VUPShionMod:TimeStop.DESCRIPTION: Prevent an enemy from acting this turn. NL Shuffle all vup_shion_mod:Loading Complete cards from your discard pile into your draw pile. Exhaust.
VUPShionMod:TimeStop.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Prevent an enemy from acting this turn. NL Put all vup_shion_mod:Loading Complete cards from your discard pile on the top of your draw pile. Exhaust.

VUPShionMod:TimeBomb.NAME: Delayed Explosion
VUPShionMod:TimeBomb.DESCRIPTION: vup_shion_mod:Loading Complete. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust Grave.

VUPShionMod:HourHand.NAME: Hour Hand
VUPShionMod:HourHand.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Shuffle 1 *Quick *Skim into youe discard pile.

VUPShionMod:MinuteHand.NAME: Minute Hand
VUPShionMod:MinuteHand.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Shuffle 1 *Quick *Attack into your discard pile.

VUPShionMod:SecondHand.NAME: Second Hand
VUPShionMod:SecondHand.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to random enemies !M! times. NL Shuffle this card into your draw pile.

VUPShionMod:CrackOfTime.NAME: Fissure in Time
VUPShionMod:CrackOfTime.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you trigger vup_shion_mod:Loading Complete , gain !M! Block .

VUPShionMod:ReleaseFormKuroisu.NAME: Cloyce Form
VUPShionMod:ReleaseFormKuroisu.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, put !M! *Quick *Skim on the top of your draw pile.
VUPShionMod:ReleaseFormKuroisu.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, put !M! *Quick *Skim+ on the top of your draw pile.

VUPShionMod:TimeWarp.NAME: Time Warp
VUPShionMod:TimeWarp.DESCRIPTION: Lose !VUPShionSecondM! vup_shion_mod:Hyperdimensional Link. Deal !D! damage to random enemies !M! times. Apply 2 Weak and vup_shion_mod:Bleeding.

VUPShionMod:BlackHand.NAME: Black Pointer
VUPShionMod:BlackHand.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! HP. NL Draw !VUPShionSecondM! cards. NL Cards drawn this way cost 0 this turn. Exhaust.
VUPShionMod:BlackHand.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! HP. NL Draw !VUPShionSecondM! cards. NL Cards drawn this way cost 0 this turn. Exhaust.

VUPShionMod:TimeOverload.NAME: Overload
VUPShionMod:TimeOverload.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! vup_shion_mod:Hyperdimensional Link. NL Gain [E] [E]. NL Lose [E] [E] next turn.
VUPShionMod:TimeOverload.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! vup_shion_mod:Hyperdimensional Link. NL Gain [E] [E]. NL Lose [E] next turn.

VUPShionMod:OverspeedField.NAME: Hypervelocity
VUPShionMod:OverspeedField.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. Then reduce the cost of all cards in your hand to 0 this turn. NL Lose [E] [E] next turn. Exhaust.

VUPShionMod:DelayAvatar.NAME: Lure
VUPShionMod:DelayAvatar.DESCRIPTION: Deploy a *Lure with !M! HP. It deals !M! damage 5 times to ALL enemies upon being destroyed. Exhaust.

VUPShionMod:FinFunnelActive.NAME: Activate Funnel
VUPShionMod:FinFunnelActive.DESCRIPTION: Trigger the passive ability of all the three vup_shion_mod:Funnel to an enemy. NL Exhaust.
VUPShionMod:FinFunnelActive.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Trigger the passive ability of all the three vup_shion_mod:Funnel to an enemy.

VUPShionMod:AttackWithDefense.NAME: Feint
VUPShionMod:AttackWithDefense.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle !M! *Quick *Attack into your draw pile. NL Gain !B! Block .

VUPShionMod:LockIndication.NAME: Snipe
VUPShionMod:LockIndication.DESCRIPTION: Trigger Dimension Splitter: Aria to an enemy. Damage dealt this way is increased by !M! and ignores Block.

VUPShionMod:TacticalLayout.NAME: Tactical Layout
VUPShionMod:TacticalLayout.DESCRIPTION: Trigger the passive ability of your vup_shion_mod:Funnel to random enemies !M! times.

VUPShionMod:FinFunnelSupport.NAME: Reinforcement
VUPShionMod:FinFunnelSupport.DESCRIPTION: Trigger the passive ability of your vup_shion_mod:Funnel to an enemy. NL Draw !M! cards.

VUPShionMod:Anticoagulation.NAME: Anticoagulant
VUPShionMod:Anticoagulation.DESCRIPTION: Prevent vup_shion_mod:Bleeding on an enemy from halving at the end of this turn. NL Exhaust.
VUPShionMod:Anticoagulation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Prevent vup_shion_mod:Bleeding on an enemy from halving at the end of this turn.

VUPShionMod:Lure.NAME: Ambush
VUPShionMod:Lure.DESCRIPTION: Trigger vup_shion_mod:Pursued on ALL enemies !M! times.

VUPShionMod:SuperCharge.NAME: Hoarse Charging
VUPShionMod:SuperCharge.DESCRIPTION: Lose !VUPShionSecondM! vup_shion_mod:Hyperdimensional Link. NL Gain !M! Strength and Dexterity.

VUPShionMod:ReleaseFormMinami.NAME: Minami Form
VUPShionMod:ReleaseFormMinami.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. Whenever you trigger the passive ability of your vup_shion_mod:Funnel by cards, trigger !M! additional time.
VUPShionMod:ReleaseFormMinami.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you trigger the passive ability of your vup_shion_mod:Funnel by cards, trigger !M! additional time.

VUPShionMod:AnestheticReagent.NAME: Anesthetics
VUPShionMod:AnestheticReagent.DESCRIPTION: Lose !VUPShionSecondM! HP. NL Gain !M! Intangible. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

VUPShionMod:EnhancedSupport.NAME: Enhanced Support
VUPShionMod:EnhancedSupport.DESCRIPTION: Trigger the passive ability of your vup_shion_mod:Funnel to an enemy 2X times.
VUPShionMod:EnhancedSupport.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Trigger the passive ability of your vup_shion_mod:Funnel to an enemy 2(X+1) times.

VUPShionMod:BattlefieldHeritage.NAME: Battlefield Heritage
VUPShionMod:BattlefieldHeritage.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! vup_shion_mod:Hyperdimensional Link. NL Put !VUPShionSecondM! Attacks from your discard pile into your hand. NL Reduce cost of them by 1 in this turn.

VUPShionMod:GravityLoading.NAME: Zero Gravity
VUPShionMod:GravityLoading.DESCRIPTION: Trigger the passive ability of *Gravity vup_shion_mod:Funnel for each enemy. NL Apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies.

VUPShionMod:FirePower.NAME: All Out！
VUPShionMod:FirePower.DESCRIPTION: Shoot a massive blast with vup_shion_mod:Funnel. Deal damage !M! times as much as vup_shion_mod:Total Upgrade to ALL enemies. NL Set vup_shion_mod:Total Upgrade to 0 this turn.

VUPShionMod:ArmedToTheTeeth.NAME: Bellicosity
VUPShionMod:ArmedToTheTeeth.DESCRIPTION: Gain Strength equal to vup_shion_mod:Hyperdimensional Link. NL Lose all vup_shion_mod:Hyperdimensional Link.

VUPShionMod:DivineRedemption.NAME: Divine Redemption
VUPShionMod:DivineRedemption.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! vup_shion_mod:Hyperdimensional Link. NL Gain !B! Block.

VUPShionMod:BlueBlade.NAME: Azure Blade
VUPShionMod:BlueBlade.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Deal additional damage !M! times as much as vup_shion_mod:Hyperdimensional Link.

VUPShionMod:HolyCharge.NAME: Sacred Lunge
VUPShionMod:HolyCharge.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! vup_shion_mod:Hyperdimensional Link, gain additional 1 for each time it is played during this combat. NL Whenever it is Retained, reduce the cost by 1.

VUPShionMod:Pray.NAME: Prayer
VUPShionMod:Pray.DESCRIPTION: Gain 2 vup_shion_mod:Hyperdimensional Link. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Reduce the cost of random !VUPShionSecondM! card drawn this way to 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.

VUPShionMod:SantaCroce.NAME: Cross
VUPShionMod:SantaCroce.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! vup_shion_mod:Hyperdimensional Link. NL Gain Block !VUPShionSecondM! times as much as vup_shion_mod:Hyperdimensional Link.

VUPShionMod:ReleaseFormLiyezhu.NAME: Liyezhu Form
VUPShionMod:ReleaseFormLiyezhu.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! vup_shion_mod:Hyperdimensional Link, gain again at the start of each of your turn. NL At the end of your turn, deal damage equal to vup_shion_mod:Hyperdimensional Link to ALL enemies.

VUPShionMod:Awaken.NAME: Resuscitate
VUPShionMod:Awaken.DESCRIPTION: Heal HP !M! times as much as vup_shion_mod:Hyperdimensional Link. Lose all vup_shion_mod:Hyperdimensional Link. NL Exhaust.

VUPShionMod:HolyCoffinSinkingSpirit.NAME: Holy Coffin
VUPShionMod:HolyCoffinSinkingSpirit.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain or lose vup_shion_mod:Hyperdimensional Link , gain !M! Block .

VUPShionMod:HolySlashDown.NAME: Crucifixion
VUPShionMod:HolySlashDown.DESCRIPTION: Deal 7+ vup_shion_mod:Hyperdimensional Link damage !M! times. NL Gain !VUPShionSecondM! vup_shion_mod:Hyperdimensional Link. NL Can be Upgraded any number of times.

VUPShionMod:PainfulConfession.NAME: Lament
VUPShionMod:PainfulConfession.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable.

VUPShionMod:HolyCoffinRelease.NAME: Liberation
VUPShionMod:HolyCoffinRelease.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you trigger vup_shion_mod:Loading Complete, gain !M! vup_shion_mod:Hyperdimensional Link.

VUPShionMod:BlueRose.NAME: Sapphire Rose
VUPShionMod:BlueRose.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! vup_shion_mod:Hyperdimensional Link. NL Lose all vup_shion_mod:Hyperdimensional Link next turn. NL Exhaust.
VUPShionMod:BlueRose.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !M! vup_shion_mod:Hyperdimensional Link. NL Lose all vup_shion_mod:Hyperdimensional Link next turn. NL Exhaust.
